name: Neujahrstag
description: New Year's Day, the first day of the year.

name: Berchtoldstag
description: Traditional Swiss holiday following New Year's Day.

name: Tag vor Karfreitag
description: Day before Good Friday, observed in the morning.

name: Karfreitag
description: Good Friday, commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus.

name: Ostermontag
description: Easter Monday, the day after Easter Sunday.

name: Tag vor Auffahrt
description: Day before Ascension Day, observed in the morning.

name: Auffahrtstag
description: Ascension Day, commemorating Jesus' ascension to heaven.

name: Pfingstmontag
description: Whit Monday, the day after Pentecost.

name: Bundesfeiertag
description: Swiss National Day, celebrating the founding of the Swiss Confederacy.

name: Heiligabend
description: Christmas Eve, marking the evening before Christmas.

name: Weihnachtstag
description: Christmas Day, celebrating the birth of Jesus Christ.

name: Stephanstag
description: St. Stephen's Day, honoring Saint Stephen.

name: Silvester
description: New Year's Eve, marking the final day of the year.
